ProcessDefinition.Title: Retrievable Items Statistics Service
ProcessDefinition.Abstract: <DESCRIPTION>Once the conflated data has been prepared, a call may be made to this endpoint to retrieve statistics about the reviewable items in the conflated dataset. Initially, only a very small set of statistics are returned. </DESCRIPTION> <EXAMPLE> <URL>http://localhost:8080/hoot-services/ogc/ReviewableItemsStatistics?mapId=1&reviewScoreThresholdMinimum=0.8&geospatialBounds=-77.09655761718749,38.89958342598271,-77.09106445312499,38.90385833966776</URL> <REQUEST_TYPE>GET</REQUEST_TYPE> <INPUT></INPUT> <OUTPUT></OUTPUT> </EXAMPLE>

LiteralInput.Title: Map ID
LiteralInput.Abstract: string; required; ID string or unique name of the map associated with the reviewable conflated data

LiteralInput.Title: Review Score Threhold Minimum
LiteralInput.Abstract: double; optional; items with a review score lower than this threshold will not be included in the returned statistics; defaults to 0.0

BoundingBoxInput.Title: Geospatial Bounds
BoundingBoxInput.Abstract: This parameter specifies the geospatial bounds that items should fall within. For GET requests, the parameter is a comma delimited string of the form: minLon,minLat,maxLon,maxLat,CRS - e.g. geospatialBounds=71.63,41.75,-70.78,42.90

LiteralOutput.Title: Statistics for the requested reviewable items
LiteralOutput.Abstract: This output contains a JSON structure containing statistics that describe reviewable items.
